option.name: /Default/CodeStyle/Naming/CppNamingOptions/Rules/=0AFB7787612DF743B09AD9412E48D4CC/@EntryIndexedValue
option.value: <NamingElement Priority="7" Title="Local variables"><Descriptor Static="Indeterminate" Constexpr="Indeterminate" Const="Indeterminate" Volatile="Indeterminate" Accessibility="NOT_APPLICABLE"><type Name="local variable" /></Descriptor><Policy Inspect="True" WarnAboutPrefixesAndSuffixes="False" Prefix="" Suffix="" Style="aaBb" /></NamingElement>
